title: (Wed Full Show) We Remember Loretta Lynn By Sharing 5 Facts About Her + Amy's Psychic Cousin Calls Into The Show + Lunchbox's Crazy Spin The Wheel Game Idea
itunes:title: (Wed Full Show) We Remember Loretta Lynn By Sharing 5 Facts About Her + Amy's Psychic Cousin Calls Into The Show + Lunchbox's Crazy Spin The Wheel Game Idea
description:
We reflect on Loretta Lynn's incredible career and legacy after her passing yesterday by sharing stories and 5 facts about her. Plus, Amy's cousin who is a psychic calls into the show and answers Bobby's big question he's been nervous to ask. Hear what she has to say! Then, Lunchbox found a DNA test online that will supposably predict when you will die. He pitches to use it as a spin the wheel game idea to see who on the show has to take the test. We share our thoughts if we think it's a good idea or not.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
